modName: TESV BSA Main Files list with all DLCs
summary: Broke down all the bsa\'s into text file listings...
descriptionHtml:
Short of it. I extracted all the BSA files individually and made a file listing of all the files in the game. Due to limitations of my own system I\'d recommend double checking both the txt file and the csv file. 

Files used:
Skyrim - Animations.bsa
Skyrim - Interface.bsa
Skyrim - Meshes.bsa
Skyrim - Misc.bsa
Skyrim - Shaders.bsa
Skyrim - Sounds.bsa
Skyrim - Textures.bsa
Skyrim - Voices.bsa
Skyrim - VoicesExtra.bsa
Skyrim - Update.bsa
Dawnguard.bsa
Dragonborn.bsa
Hearthfires.bsa.bsa

YOU\'D BETTER APPRECIATE THIS. IT TOOK ME 5 HOURS TO UPLOAD THE UPDATE ON 56K
I will be updating the HiRex Texture Pack file lists separated when I get a chance.  This mess here has taken me about a month.

Blessings to all and hope these help the excellent modders out there.

Other uploads by me:
